title: Dream Seekers
overview: Dream Seekers is a coming-of-age series that is based on Hui Ling, a university undergraduate who dreams of becoming a singer but struggles with her passion due to her financially struggling parents who disregards her dreams and wants her to focus on her studies instead. Wanting to prove them wrong, she is fortuitously introduced to Zhi Jie, a misunderstood butt-headed hooligan and "lead" singer in a small unknown band in school. Hui Ling discovers that he is tone deaf, yet decides to be a part of this group of passionate musicians albeit by force. Their awkward friendship eventually blossoms and with Zhi Jie's help, Hui Ling sets herself on a mission to prove her parents wrong.
